verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G746>elementary<s%> <S%G3056>teaching<s%> about the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let us <S%G5342>press<s%> on to <S%G5047>maturity,<s%> not <S%G2598>laying<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> from <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> and of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

of <S%G1322>instruction<s%> about <S%G909>washings,<s%> and <S%G1936>laying<s%> on of <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2917>judgment.<s%>
And <S%G3778>this<s%> we shall <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4007><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2010>permits.<s%>

For in the case of <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G530>once<s%> been <S%G5461>enlightened<s%> and have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> of the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> and have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>
and have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G165>age<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%>

and [then] have <S%G3895>fallen<s%> <S%G3895>away,<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> to <S%G340>renew<s%> them <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> since they <S%G388>again<s%> <S%G388>crucify<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G3856>put<s%> Him to <S%G3856>open<s%> <S%G3856>shame.<s%>

For <S%G1093>ground<s%> that <S%G4095>drinks<s%> the <S%G5205>rain<s%> which <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G2064>falls<s%> upon it and <S%G5088>brings<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G1008>vegetation<s%> <S%G2111>useful<s%> to <S%G1565>those<s%> for <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1223>sake<s%> it is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1090>tilled,<s%> <S%G3335>receives<s%> a <S%G2129>blessing<s%> from <S%G2316>God;<s%>

but if it <S%G1627>yields<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> and <S%G5146>thistles,<s%> it is <S%G96>worthless<s%> and <S%G1451>close<s%> to being <S%G2671>cursed,<s%> and it <S%G5056>ends<s%> up being <S%G2740>burned.<s%>

But, <S%G27>beloved,<s%> we are <S%G3982>convinced<s%> of <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G2909>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> you, and things that <S%G2192>accompany<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> we are <S%G2980>speaking<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G94>unjust<s%> so as to <S%G1950>forget<s%> your <S%G2041>work<s%> and the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1731>shown<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> His <S%G3686>name,<s%> in having <S%G1247>ministered<s%> and in still <S%G1247>ministering<s%> to the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And we <S%G1937>desire<s%> that <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> of you <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> <S%G4314>so<s%> as to realize the <S%G4136>full<s%> <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5056>end,<s%>

that you may not be <S%G3576>sluggish,<s%> but <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

For when <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1861>made<s%> the <S%G1861>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G1893>since<s%> He <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> by <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3173>greater,<s%> He <S%G3660>swore<s%> by <S%G1438>Himself,<s%>
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I will <S%G3375>surely<s%> <S%G2127><s%> <S%G2127>bless<s%> you, and I will <S%G4129>surely<s%> <S%G4129>multiply<s%> you."
And <S%G3779>thus,<s%> having <S%G3114>patiently<s%> <S%G3114>waited,<s%> he <S%G2013>obtained<s%> the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

For <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> by <S%G3173>one<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> [than themselves], and with them an <S%G3727>oath<s%> [given] as <S%G951>confirmation<s%> is an <S%G4009>end<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G485>dispute.<s%>

In the <S%G3739>same<s%> way <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1014>desiring<s%> <S%G4053>even<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> to the <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> the <S%G276>unchangeableness<s%> of His <S%G1012>purpose,<s%> <S%G3315>interposed<s%> with an <S%G3727>oath,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that by <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G276>unchangeable<s%> <S%G4229>things,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5574>lie,<s%> we may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G3874>encouragement,<s%> we who have <S%G2703>fled<s%> for <S%G2703>refuge<s%> in <S%G2902>laying<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4295>set<s%> <S%G4295>before<s%> us.

<S%G3739>This<s%> hope we <S%G2192>have<s%> as an <S%G45>anchor<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul,<s%> a [hope] <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G804>sure<s%> and <S%G949>steadfast<s%> and one which <S%G1525>enters<s%> <S%G2082>within<s%> the <S%G2665>veil,<s%>

<S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> has <S%G1525>entered<s%> as a <S%G4274>forerunner<s%> for us, having <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>
